scripts.build: npm run prepare && npm run bundle && npm run build-ts
scripts.prepare: echo installing typings... && cd 0.11.0 && typings install
scripts.bundle: echo bundling... && cd 0.11.0 && typings bundle -o out/index.d.ts
scripts.build+test: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.cleanup-typings: echo Removing typings folders... && for /d /r . %d in (typings) do @if exist %d rd /s/q %d
scripts.cleanup-out: echo Removing out folders... && for /d /r . %d in (out) do @if exist %d rd /s/q %d
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup-typings && npm run cleanup-out
